metadata.name: The Trolleymigos Problem
metadata.description:
Winner of this auction gets their Nakamigo featured in the next episode of Nakaventures™

Witness a Nakamigo grappling with the iconic "Trolley Problem" in this animation. As the protagonist panics and struggles to decide, fate intervenes with an unexpected twist. This ironic and captivating scene showcases Nakamigo's indecisiveness and life's unpredictability through a fresh take on a philosophical puzzle.

Huge shoutout to @VoxelQueen for the amazing character models!
